questions.question: What is the Random Search Algorithm??

answers.a: A search algorithm that always finds the optimal solution
answers.b: A search algorithm that explores the graph in a systematic manner
answers.c: A heuristic algorithm used for optimization problems
answers.d: A graph traversal algorithm that always finds the shortest path

questions.question: What is the main advantage of using Random Search in graph search?

answers.a: It guarantees finding an optimal solution
answers.c: It can only be applied to certain types of graphs
answers.d: It always finds the shortest path in the graph

questions.question: What is a common use case for the Random Search Algorithm?

answers.a: Finding the shortest path in a graph

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of a problem that can be solved using the Random Search Algorithm?

answers.a: Finding the shortest path between two cities
answers.b: Determining the most efficient way to schedule employees
answers.c: Minimizing the cost of a production process
answers.d: Finding the maximum flow through a network

questions.question: What is the difference between the Random Search Algorithm and the Hill Climbing Algorithm?

answers.a: Hill Climbing always finds the optimal solution, while Random Search does not
answers.b: Hill Climbing explores the graph in a systematic manner, while Random Search is random
answers.c: Hill Climbing only works with directed graphs, while Random Search works with any type of graph
answers.d: There is no difference between the two algorithms

questions.question: Can the Random Search Algorithm be used for multi-objective optimization?
